about_the_game:
Enjoy your favorite card game at the table of a warm Norse tavern, where clans, mead, and the desire for exploration mingle. Follow Eivor’s path to glory: explore, collect resources, battle against other players, and play all your cards to be worthy of Valhalla.

For the first time in UNO®, the board becomes part of the gameplay:

• Discard your cards wisely to travel across the board and collect precious cargo to unlock exclusive perks.
• Collect cargo to engage in card fights with your opponents to slow them down and use your longboat to discard several cards at once.
• Immerse yourself in the Viking fantasy: play your cards to the rhythm of the epic Assassin’s Creed® Valhalla soundtrack.
detailed_description:
Enjoy your favorite card game at the table of a warm Norse tavern, where clans, mead, and the desire for exploration mingle. Follow Eivor’s path to glory: explore, collect resources, battle against other players, and play all your cards to be worthy of Valhalla.

For the first time in UNO®, the board becomes part of the gameplay:

• Discard your cards wisely to travel across the board and collect precious cargo to unlock exclusive perks.
• Collect cargo to engage in card fights with your opponents to slow them down and use your longboat to discard several cards at once.
• Immerse yourself in the Viking fantasy: play your cards to the rhythm of the epic Assassin’s Creed® Valhalla soundtrack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9550 | AMD Phenom II X4 945 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 | AMD Radeon HD 5670 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560TI or AMD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board

short_description: Play your favorite card game like a Viking in UNO® Valhalla DLC, inspired by the world of Assassin’s Creed® Valhalla.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
